## Decisions.Decision.getAbstractKey() method

Helper function to return a stable key for a the condition sets that make up a [decision](./ts-res.decisions.decision.md)<!-- -->. The abstract key is a `+`<!-- -->-separated list of the hashes of the sorted condition sets that make up the decision.

**Signature:**

```typescript
static getAbstractKey(conditionSets: ReadonlyArray<ConditionSet>): DecisionKey;
```

<table><thead><tr><th>

</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

conditionSets


</td><td>

ReadonlyArray&lt;[ConditionSet](./ts-res.conditionset.md)<!-- -->&gt;


</td><td>

The condition sets to use to create the key.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

[DecisionKey](./ts-res.decisionkey.md)

A key derived from the condition set hashes.
